title: Keystone Basketball Holds Hoops for Hope Event
content: KNOX, Pa. (EYT) – Friday’s boys’ and girls’ basketball doubleheader between Keystone and Clarion at Keystone was a Hoops for Hope Event honoring people who have survived cancer, lost their battle with the disease and those currently fighting it. Money was raised in a variety of ways with all proceeds going to the Clarion Hospital […]
